text: 10.5 1 Ko 1.19, 3.19 Lum awl gos okok mɨdupsek dɨyokɨl, gos keke okok abe dɨyokɨpun. Binɨb okok kɨli God nop nɨgun agɨl apal ak pen, gos tɨmel anɨb okok kɨlop kanɨb gɨñub. Anɨb ak chɨn binɨb okok gos tɨmud kɨlop nag lɨpun, bɨ olap nop nag lɨpal tek mɨdeb. Nag lɨl kɨlop gek, gos kɨli ak Klays takaw agup ak kɨdek gɨnɨgabal.
